name: Verify Camera Terminal UI Elements and Initial Display
description: Validates that camera terminal displays correct UI elements including 0/0 counter, crosshair, and set course prompt.
testObjective: Ensure camera terminal UI is properly initialized with all required elements.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Player can interact with camera terminal (left terminal)

steps.action: Interact with the camera terminal (left terminal)
Observe UI elements in top left corner
Observe UI elements in bottom center

steps.expected: Crosshair overlay is visible in center
Planet is visible to the right of the crosshair

postconditions: All UI elements are displayed correctly
Camera view shows space and planet
